title: Puppet master (New champion Idea) & Commando (New champion Idea)
body:
So yeah this one goes out to gypsy lord, I'm sure he loves me after I dedicated a champion to him at Luna park this year.
Main idea: Puppet master gains strength from switching other players controlled champions around.

Role:
Jungle/teleport top (seems to utilize most benefits from being tanky and getting behind the enemy in fights due to his E)

Q: Sends out two strings (kind of like a lulu Q but they cross)
Upon hitting two allied champions (Champions swap complete control i.e. movement and ability to cast spells etc for 10 seconds and both gain a damage boon of 50% each)
Upon hitting two enemy champions (Control is swapped and movement speed is slowed by 30% of both champions)
Upon hitting an ally and an enemy (Both champions each control their own movement but can only cast spells from the swapped target, would be super hard to pull this off but high reward could burn their ulti if they haven't used it etc)

W: Use on enemy champion spells that are currently being used get stolen
(i.e. brand chucks an ulti in and it's still mid motion and then boom stolen but would work with any champion with an ongoing effect and rewards quick reaction speed in some cases)

E: Throws his strings until it travels 1500 distance or until it hits immovable territory (enemies that pass over the string will break the string and will over 0.5s ministun and then is slowed for 4 seconds diminishing effect 40->10%). While the puppet master is casting this spell he enters a semi statis illusional state and cannot be hit by non magical sources.

R: Steals all buffs/shields/spellblock/resurrect effect from an enemy champion and places them on yourself
(imagine how powerful it would actually be if picked into a tahm kench/lulu/master yi/olaf, someone that can really boost themselves and then just to take it away from them.

Pros: Good pick into a team with plenty of buffs
Cons: Needs a teamfight to utilize full potential

Idea 2)

Commando

Role:
ADC (600 range)

Main idea: Theres not really many champions in the game currently that have to pick out opportunities based on like a time limitation or such as of now. I actually liked that wolf chap in primitive wc3 dota that was stronger at night time.

Q: Pulsar signal
Passive Send's out a pulse every 30 seconds that disables the map of nearby enemys and turns of wards placed by them for 10 seconds (800 range)
Active: Overload pulsar signal, implodes the signal around the commando to deal damage to all targets inside the circle as the pulse travels back towards him. (So this would be only activateable when the passive triggers)

W: Land mine place a mine underneath you that will explode in 3 seconds, if any enemy walks near it or over it this will be reduced to 0.2 seconds. Will deal damage and opponent hit will lose vision for 1 second.

E: Commando will jump a certain range maybe 500 range and fire 3 shots at a set angle (maybe a mechanic like click drag similar to rumbles ulti whereas the first click picks the jump location and the drag sets the angle)

R: Final last blows
When Commando would die he instead goes invisible for 15 seconds and loses 15% move speed
He can reactivate when in melee range of an enemy champion to deal something like 200/300/400 damage and if this damage is fatal the commando revives himself on 1% health. (Doesn't revive him if he doesn't get a kill with this skill)

So this adc is not an all out skirmisher would lose in most 1v1 situations but still has the ability to win via vision disruption and outplaying the opponent with the land mine ability. Through skill can potentially die, if he has good awareness of the enemy flash cooldowns etc can stalk enemies and pick opportune times to try revive turning situations that look like the enemy is winning a battle into devastating losses.

Pros: Good choice into passive lanes and especially into squishy teams where his ultimate can be more effective.
Cons: Bad against hard engage adcs
